original_text: Ye shall therefore put difference between clean beasts and unclean, and between unclean fowls and clean: and ye shall not make your souls abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which I have separated from you as unclean.
korean_text: 너희는 짐승이 정하고 부정함과 새가 정하고 부정함을 구별하고 내가 너희를 위하여 부정한 것으로 구별한 짐승이나 새나 땅에 기는 것들로 너희의 몸을 더럽히지 말라

sentences.original_text: and between unclean fowls and clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 부정한 새와 정한 새 사이에

sentences.original_text: and ye shall not make your souls abominable
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 너희 영혼을 가증하게 만들지 말라

sentences.original_text: or by any manner of living thing
which I have separated from you
